title: Love Island host Sophie Monk shares her 'hidden talent'
text:
She's the Love Island host known to set pulses racing wherever she goes.

But Sophie Monk's latest upload didn't exactly ooze sex appeal - as she decided to show off her 'useless talent' with her thousands of followers while on holiday in Fiji.

In the footage, the gorgeous model, 39, was seen rolling her stomach up and down 11 times, before laughing hysterically at what she had achieved.

Hidden talent! Sophie Monk (pictured) took to Instagram to reveal she could bizarrely roll her stomach up and down 11 times in a row

Sophie - showing off her incredibly toned bikini body in the process - went completely make-up free in the short clip, with her hair in a casual up-do.

'Anyone else have useless talents that never come in handy?' Sophie, who is on holiday with boyfriend Joshua Gross, quipped.

The beautiful blonde has been hosting Love Island since it first aired last year.

Bikini beauty! Sophie looked nothing short of sensational in a stripy bikini in footage posted on her Instagram page

She recently promised fans she would be appearing on the show much more than last year, after leaving viewers scratching their heads when she only appeared a handful of times in the 2018 season.

Some fans even questioned whether Channel Nine executives had spent their money wisely after Sophie signed a rumoured $1 million deal with the network.

'[I will be on there] maybe a little more because there are a heap of new twists and turns on this season,' she told OK! magazine.

She's back! Sophie Monk promises to be on Love Island even more than last year

While her role is more wide-ranging than last year, Love Island Australia will still remain focused on the sexy contestants and their 'recoupling' ceremonies.

'The show is all about the boys and girls,' she added.

'I'm the host and I think people are more aware of how Love Island works [now] and what my role is.'
description: She's the Love Island host known to set pulses racing wherever she goes.
authors: Nicole Douglas For Daily Mail Australia
